quadrillion

Class QPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • quadrillion.QPiece

  • public class QPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a piece by storing the coordinates occupied by the piece explicitly in its local coordinate system. Provides functionality for rotation and the flipping of the pieces.
    Version:
    20190316
    Author:
    Unsal Ozturk - uensalo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flip(boolean direction)
      Flips the piece along the x or y axis depending on the parameter supplied.
      java.util.List<QCoordinate> getPieceCoordinates()
      Returns a list of the coordinates which the piece occupies, in local coordinates.
      QPieceType getPieceType()
      Returns the type of the piece as present in the original game, one among the 12 types.
      void rotate90(boolean direction)
      Rotates the piece 90 degrees, clockwise or counter-clockwise according to the parameter supplied.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • rotate90

        public void rotate90(boolean direction)
        Rotates the piece 90 degrees, clockwise or counter-clockwise according to the parameter supplied.
        Parameters:
        direction - True indicates a counter-clockwise rotation, false indicates a clockwise rotation.

      • flip

        public void flip(boolean direction)
        Flips the piece along the x or y axis depending on the parameter supplied.
        Parameters:
        direction - True indicates a flip along the x axis, false indicates a flip along the y axis.

      • getPieceCoordinates

        public java.util.List<QCoordinate> getPieceCoordinates()
        Returns a list of the coordinates which the piece occupies, in local coordinates.
        Returns:
        The list of occupied coordinates in the local coordinate system.

      • getPieceType

        public QPieceType getPieceType()
        Returns the type of the piece as present in the original game, one among the 12 types.
        Returns:
        The type of the piece.
